channel.description:

Anyone trying to visit said player will visit you instead, they will not know who they were forced to visit. Goes through redirection immunity. Unlimited uses. >_(Anyone redirected by this ability will get a message saying "You were forced to target The Diseased!")._ > > **Night ability 2: Expunge** > Everyone who visits you tonight will die. item.description:
Chocolate:

well, if you latch on to one healer the whole game, are you really playing?

You will mainly be redirecting from the people who claim poisoned or bleeding or important roles that are likely to be healed. Most of the time when someone asks for healing all of the healers in the game will try to heal that person, which means ALL healers will be immune to your redirection after three uses.

item.title: [Class suggestion] The Diseased
item.dc:creator: psychoneirik
item.description:
What about this?

At the beginning of each day (starting from day 2) if you are not poisoned or bleeding you will become poisoned/bleeding (depends on the evil faction). You will die in 2 days unless healed.

If the passive poisons you at day instead of night that means you will be poisoned again immediately even if you are healed. I think making him die in one day would be a bit harsh, since you will die if the prince ever jails you (which will happen most games).

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] The Diseased
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
I really like this idea.

The fact that it has to be harmful in order to live makes it difficult, so they have to hide in order to succeed. It’s also interesting because they need the Healers alive.

One suggestion:

You should die in one night, and be able to healed on a night when you get poisoned/bled, like a Hunter’s wolf. 2 days is a lot of time to draw Healers, and means you have a night when you don’t need them.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] The Diseased
item.dc:creator: psychoneirik
item.description:
The diseased is a neutral class that is permanently poisoned and needs to bait healers in order to survive. This class is usually harmful to the BD since it will redirect healers from healing important targets to healing him.

The Diseased
Neutral, Offensive

Passive: Chronic disease
At the beginning of each day (starting from day 2) if you are not poisoned or bleeding you will become poisoned/bleeding (depends on the evil faction). You will die in 2 days unless healed.

Passive 2: Sympathy
Immune to death and occupation.

Day ability 1: Insurance
Anyone that tries to heal you tonight will be immune to death and occupation. 3 uses.

Night ability 1: Pity
Select a player. Anyone trying to visit said player will visit you instead, they will not know who they were forced to visit. Goes through redirection immunity. Unlimited uses.
(Anyone redirected by this ability will get a message saying “You were forced to target The Diseased!”).

Night ability 2: Expunge
Everyone who visits you tonight will die. If at least one person dies this way you will be healed of any poison/bleeding. 3 uses.

Goal: Survive.
